title: Expense Lines
content:
Expense lines enable you to:

  • Track and manage costs associated with contracts, devices, infrastructure & peripheral assets, licenses, subscriptions, and users.
  • Optimize spend and resources by providing transparency into costs and budgets.
  • Forecast expenses over a period to manage current budget and plan future budgets.

Expense lines can be generated automatically based on cost allocation rules or created manually.

Important: In order for the Expense Lines menu items to be displayed in Financial Management, the tenant admin must first enable the Enable expense line option in Administration > Configuration > Application Settings.

Related topics

  • To learn how to configure cost allocation rules, see Cost Allocation.
  • To learn how to create expense lines manually, see Create an expense line manually.
  • For more information about the Expense Lines page, see View an expense line.
